sr/share/info --enable-shared --enable-threads=posix --disable-checking --with-s

t=gtk --host=x86_64-redhat-linux

creator: nguyen.vietha@microfocus.com

text:
Surely you are familiar with http://httpd.apache.org/dev/debugging.html ?

If not, welcome, and please provide a backtrace so we can work out what happened :)
creator: wrowe@apache.org

text:
Hi

Thank you for fast response. I will update the with more backtrace in a short time.
creator: nguyen.vietha@microfocus.com

text:
Hi, I try to get the backtrace from gdb execution and got following result:

$ apachectl -k start
/net/pacrim/AppServer/rtm/rh64/67/basc143_openjms/bin/apache2/apachectl: line 80
:  7754 Segmentation fault      (core dumped) $HTTPD $ARGV

$ gdb httpd core.7754

mat not recognized

che2/httpd -k start'.

Can you help to advise?
creator: nguyen.vietha@microfocus.com

text:
Hi,


I had a problem with platform build so now the the failure is solved. The case can be closed now. Thank you.


Rg,
Viet Ha.
creator: nguyen.vietha@microfocus.com
